official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Sudden Infant Death Program under part B of title XI of the Public Health Service Act.
short_title: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome Amendments of 1981

summary.text: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome Amendments of 1981 - Amends title XI (Genetic Diseases, Hemophilia Programs, and Sudden Infant Death Syndrome) of the Public Health Service Act to extend funding authorizations for the sudden infant death program through fiscal year 1984.

titles.title: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome Amendments of 1981
A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Sudden Infant Death Program under part B of title XI of the Public Health Service Act.
